attributes.action: Make a rebate on fuel duty for travel to work in proportion to rate of income tax paid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that paying the full fuel duty  for travel to work is unfair.  We pay income tax on the salary earned which is the Inland Revenue portion of that salary therefore they should contribute to the costs of travel to earn their share.
ie... 22% of fuel duty paid returned as a tax rebate for lower rate tax payers and proportionally more for higher rate tax payers.
